VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.usbcam: v4l2src device=/dev/video0 ! video/x-raw, framerate=30/1, width=640, height=360 ! videoconvert ! appsink
VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.CSI1: nvarguscamerasrc sensor_id=0 ! video/x-raw(memory:NVMM),width=640, height=480, framerate=15/1, format=NV12 ! nvvidconv ! video/x-raw, format=BGRx, width=640, height=480 ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw, format=BGR ! appsink
VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.CSI2: nvarguscamerasrc sensor_id=1 ! video/x-raw(memory:NVMM),width=640, height=480, framerate=15/1, format=NV12 ! nvvidconv ! video/x-raw, format=BGRx, width=640, height=480 ! videoconvert ! video/x-raw, format=BGR ! appsink
VIDEO_INPUTS_PARAMS.remote_hls_gstreamer: souphttpsrc location=http://YOUR_HLSSTREAM_URL_HERE.m3u8 ! hlsdemux ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! videoscale ! appsink
